attributes.action: Stop Department of Work & Penions deducting money from State Pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: intervene to prevent Department of Work and Pensions taking deductions from State Pensions to repay overpayment of  State Benefit. Further it is respectfully requested that the 6 year limitations period should also be applied as this is a fair period to call in a debt.  Most recently DWP have been calling in so called debts that are 13 years old causing hardship to the vulnerable.
